fields_of_interest: Business and Industry, Single market, Transport
eu_initiatives: Automotive Recast Framework Directive (2007/46/EC)  and the General Safety Regulation (661/2009)
organisation_name: Organisation Europeenne des Constructeurs des Vehicules Accessibles (OECVA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
To represent the Wheelchair Accessible Vehicles (Special Purpose Vehicles) sector within the European Automotive Industry. 
 
To improve the quality and safety of WAVs on the market throughout Europe.  
 
To work with regulators and legislators to ensure that this small but important sector can continue to manufacture accessible vehicles for the benefit of the disabled people who need to use them.
